mapper.select: select convert(char(10),SendTime,120) dateTime, sum(SaleNum - ReturnNum - SeparateNum - ScrapNum) saleNum from (select * from PT_TaskSaleInvoice where SendTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime} and (VehiceNumber > '0') and (VehicleStatus = '3') and InvoiceType != 6) pt left join PT_TaskPlan pp on pp.compid=pt.compid and pp.TaskId=pt.TaskId where pt.compid=#{compid} group by convert(char(10),SendTime,120) order by dateTime desc
